entry.title: Men’s Polyester Polo T-Shirt
entry.summary:
Vendor: Uniform Craft
Type:
Price: 700.00

FABRIC

  •   100% Polyester

 

PRODUCT DESCRIPTION

  •             Solid Polo T-shirt
  •            Regular Collar
  •        Half Sleeve
  •        Slim Fit

WASH CARE

  •            Wash Inside Out with similar colours
  •        Line Dry in Shade
  •             DO NOT WRING
  •             DO NOT BLEACH
  •        Warm Iron

entry.title: Women's Support Staff Vest - SSV
entry.summary:
Vendor: FineYarns
Type: Female Support Staff
Price: 450.00

Fabric

  •  Polyester Cotton Twill

Uniforms

  •   Two bottom pockets

Wash care

Our uniforms lasts long if you care for it right.

  • Warm Machine Wash with similar colours, 
  • Wash Inside out, 
  • Do not bleach, 
  • Line dry in shade, 
  • Warm Iron.
